description:
Rarely do you happen upon such a fabulous combination.

Noeline Ross is proud to present 33 Shoveler Crescent, Erskine to the market…

*View the WALKTHROUGH video of this stunning home in the links.

Situated in sought after and family friendly suburb of Erskine, just moments from the water's edge and the award-winning foreshore and family area designed by Mirvac, you will find this simply stunning home is just waiting for memories to be made.

Built by award-winning local builder WA Home Group and finished to a level that will inspire and impress.

Flowing seamlessly through the open courtyard is the alfresco entertaining, situated under the main roof and proudly displays a beautiful outlook across to a peaceful park, with summer on its way this will be the ultimate area to enjoy gatherings, BBQ's, a morning cuppa and so much more. Low maintenance gardens stylishly finish this space.

Entering the home you are greeted by soaring high ceilings and an entrance hall leading the way through to the heart of the home which encompasses the stunning main living areas and the welcoming kitchen, comprising of a large island bench with breakfast bar, ample storage, pot drawers, overhead cabinetry, feature tiled splashback, counter sunk double sink, x2 stainless steel 600mm ovens and 900mm 5 burner gas cooktop, plus a secondary open scullery space. With homely touches everywhere you look, coupled with chic and modern décor this space has a sense of warmth and functionality. Ducted reverse cycle air-conditioning also runs throughout the home, ensuring comfort all year round.

The spacious laundry is off of the kitchen and also features ample storage and feature tiling, plus external access via a glass sliding door.

In the second wing of the home is the separate theatre - Get the popcorn and settle in!
In this wing we also find an open activity/study area with feature skylight and the decent sized minor bedrooms both with built in robes. The main bathroom has also been finished to a high level, offering glass shower screen, floating cabinetry and a bath to revel in relaxation.

The luxury Master Suite is set to the rear of the property showcasing stunning solid timber flooring, feature designed wall to separate the open walk in robe that will provide all the space needed for the essentials, plus a resort inspired ensuite bathroom - Expect to be impressed by the floating cabinetry, double vanities, LED lighting, full length mirror, free standing bath, separate w/c and hobless glass shower screens.

Heading to the outdoor living, be met by timber decking leading to a sprawling grassed area, ready for the kids and pets to run around! There is also a single gate to section off the pets if needed.

Other features include:
x12 Solar panels on a 3kw inverter
Alarm system
Instantaneous gas hot water system
Roller shutters

Homes like this one do not come along every day… To discuss this rare opportunity call Noeline Ross on 0408 947 302 or 9550 2030 to arrange your private inspection today.

*View the WALKTHROUGH video of this stunning home in the links.
